background.story: Code name: Hound. A bounty hunter known as the hound of hell. It is said that no one can escape from this former Imperial Navy officer once he targets them. The only consolation for criminals is that this man isn’t motivated by their bounties alone. While there are many theories, the most convincing one is that he’s after revenge. There are moments when this cold-hearted man seems to warm up, they say. It's when he pulls out an old pendant, which nobody has actually seen.

itemIntroductions.weapon: It is unarguably the culmination of the latest imperial technomagi technology. It can transform into three modes, the last of which uses magic that is so devastating that its use has to be restricted. According to Valance, the head of the imperial weapons development organization MagosLe’Flamme, the new weapon Archistra was stolen, immediately after its development, by Crow, a former naval officer who was dishonorably discharged. It remains to be confirmed whether Crow really did manage to infiltrate one of the Empire's most important organizations to steal Archistra... It's also possible that Valance simply handed it over to him, given their long friendship.
treasures: A bullet that has teeth marks of a Hellhound. Those hit by this bullet are branded with the mark of the Hellhound, which won't disappear until they draw their last breath. No matter how far they run, the teeth of the Hellhound will find them.

Magos Le'Flamme, the imperial weapons development organization, succeeded in enhancing the Ground Chill Missile. They tried to equip it on the new weapon Akistra to test it out. However, Crow stole Akistra, so the missile that was equipped on it was stolen as well. This missile contains a powerful chill, and it's enough to freeze the surrounding land.

A precious pendant containing the picture of Crow's deceased wife and daughter. He's frequently stares at the picture while sucking on candy, looking extremely sad and yet calm. It's a pendant even more precious than his life, so you better not lay a finger on it. Even if you are a god, you will have to pay with your life.

A carousel music box that Crow's wife Rose liked. Crow was walking on the street of Orvelia and saw this old music box in the shop display. He stood still on the road, looking at it for a long time, and went inside the shop. He wound the music box and stood there, listening to the melody silently. - It's the same one. - I said I would buy her a new one, but she just liked this old, worn music box. He murmured quietly, and bought the music box. In his eyes, his wife was playing the music box to her daughter with a big smile on her face.
